summary.para: Sets the policy for which media sources and transforms are enumerated.

param.name: policy
param.para: A value from the enumeration that specifies the policy.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Controls how media sources and transforms are enumerated in Microsoft Media Foundation.

remarks.para: To get a pointer to this interface, call and query the returned pointer for IMFPluginControl2.
